targets.query: SELECT sum("mean_rate") FROM (SELECT mean("Rate") as "mean_rate" FROM "$retention"."segmentstore_stream_write_bytes" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "scope", "stream" ) GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("mean_rate") FROM (SELECT mean("Rate") as "mean_rate" FROM "$retention"."segmentstore_stream_read_bytes" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "scope", "stream" ) GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
